name: CMS Demo MCP Server
description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server that exposes 10 tools for Customer and Card Management System. Provides AI-accessible APIs for managing customers and cards through the CMS Demo API.

fields.tools: get_all_customers, get_customer_by_id, create_customer, update_customer, delete_customer, get_all_cards, get_card_by_id, create_card, update_card, delete_card
